migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 15.8.2-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Remove @nrwl/cli.
migrations.name: 16.0.0-remove-nrwl-cli

migrations.description: Replace `dependsOn.projects` and `inputs` definitions with new configuration format.
migrations.name: 16.0.0-tokens-for-depends-on

migrations.description: Replace @nrwl/nx-cloud with nx-cloud
migrations.name: 16.0.0-update-nx-cloud-runner

migrations.description: Remove outputPath from run commands
migrations.name: 16.2.0-remove-output-path-from-run-commands

migrations.description: Replace @nx/workspace with @nx/workspace
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Generates a plugin called 'workspace-plugin' containing your workspace generators.
migrations.name: 16-0-0-move-workspace-generators-into-local-plugin

migrations.description: Fix .babelrc presets if it contains an invalid entry for @nx/web/babel.
migrations.name: 16-0-0-fix-invalid-babelrc

migrations.description: Replace @nx/linter with @nx/linter
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Replace @nx/eslint-plugin with @nx/eslint-plugin
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Replace @nx/jest with @nx/jest
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Update the tsconfig.spec.json to use target es2016 for jest-preset-angular v13
migrations.name: update-tsconfig-spec-jest

migrations.description: Update the file-server executor to use @nrwl/web:file-server
migrations.name: update-file-server-executor

migrations.description: Replace the deprecated library generator 'simpleModuleName' option from generator defaults with 'simpleName'
migrations.name: remove-library-generator-simple-module-name-option

migrations.description: Replace @nx/angular with @nx/angular
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Remove protractor as default e2eTestRunner from nxJson and project configurations
migrations.name: remove-protractor-defaults-from-generators

migrations.description: Remove karma as default unitTestRunner from nxJson and project configurations
migrations.name: remove-karma-defaults-from-generators

migrations.description: Remove exported `@angular/platform-server` `renderModule` method. The `renderModule` method is now exported by the Angular CLI.
migrations.name: remove-render-module-platform-server-exports

migrations.description: Remove 'ngcc' invocation if exists from the 'postinstall' script in package.json.
migrations.name: remove-ngcc-invocation

migrations.description: Extract the app config for standalone apps
migrations.name: extract-app-config-for-standalone

migrations.description: Update server executors' configuration to disable 'buildOptimizer' for non optimized builds.
migrations.name: update-server-executor-config

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~16.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-16-0-0

migrations.description: Switch the data persistence operator imports to '@ngrx/router-store/data-persistence'.
migrations.name: switch-data-persistence-operators-imports-to-ngrx-router-store

migrations.description: As of Angular v16, the `moduleId` property of `@Component` is deprecated as it no longer has any effect.
migrations.name: migration-v16-remove-module-id

migrations.description: In Angular version 15.2, the guard and resolver interfaces (CanActivate, Resolve, etc) were deprecated. This migration removes imports and 'implements' clauses that contain them.
migrations.name: migration-v16-guard-and-resolve-interfaces

migrations.description: Updates the Angular Material to v16
migrations.name: migration-v16

migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v16
